name: Tile-On: Matching Game
description:
4 DIFFERENT MATCHING GAMES

1- Match-On: Match 3 tiles on the top layer and eliminate them

2- Pair-On: Flip two tiles and try to find same stone and eliminate tiles one after the other before the time runs out.

3- Slide-On: Match and eliminate the falling stones without touching the ground.

4- Math-On:Use the four operations to find the desired number.
